text: Egha me ghaze, “E datɨrɨghɨn uari uari bagh nguibar ekiatamɨn ingaram, egh an aven tauan bar ruaritam asaraghtɨ, an ruarim mangɨ overiamɨn suiragham. Egh kamagh, e uari abɨgh mangɨ tintinibar nguazimɨn nguibar igharazibar ikian kogham. E kamaghɨn damutɨ, gumazamiziba bar ziar bar ekiam e danɨngam.”
